name: Memory Match (pythonsweet)
description:
Memory Match

This game is a computer copy of the simple Memory Match game. Basically, you have to find all the pairs and then the game will tell you how many tries it took you to do that!

Problems that might happen

Sometimes, Avast Antivirus might suspect this app and go through thorough checks to make sure it has no viruses, since it is an exe file. Eventually, it will detect no viruses and the app will function perfectly. On some occasions, it will reload but no more problems will occur. So no need to fret and get scared.
